title: Anyone ever see any actual constructive discussions on these boards recently?
body:
Because from what I've seen most threads are just shitposts or everyone yelling opinions at each other while upvoting/downvoting each other lol

Like it's seeming exceedingly pointless to even bother posting half the time unless its to humor myself with a thread full of people who are raging like crazy over something they don't like.  I know this isn't a new thing but it seems actual conversation on the LoL boards in general are pretty dead
